modName: Animations and Simply Knock compatibility patch
summary: A quick fix to make Chesko's Simply Knock and Animations by Genebriss work together.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows to use both Animations and Simply Knock without disabling looting animation in the former. It requires both of them, of course.

It's a quick and dirty fix in scripts, but I've been using it for a couple of days and it works just fine. Please let me know if you encounter any issues with it.
author: ohwellwhatever
